In England, in the seven days to 07 May, there were 12,281 new confirmed cases (21.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 April, there were 12,821 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (540 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 May is 3,880,345 (6,893.9 cases per 100,000 population).
